page.title: 17 LOCAL VIEWS AND ISSUES
page.content: The school took out a tape recorder to record the views and attitudes of people living in the area. We asked one inhabitant if there was any crime. He said no, but then added that the church candlesticks had been stolen 8 years ago. There were no policemen at either place, and the police house at Coombe Hill was closed 3 years ago and the policeman sent to Ashchurch near Tewkesbury. Some of the local people did not like visitors because they thought they left litter.The Gloucester Journal and the Evesham Journal are local weekly papers and some people take The Gloucestershire Echo, an evening paper from Cheltenham. Most people had a radio and/or television.{SEVERN SOUND} is a local commercial radio station.
